marklogic.body:
I am sad that N. Korea is resorting to this. They had a chance for a clean slate and are throwing it all away. I am Glad to see Japan telling them exactly what will happen just so there are no surprises later on when the missile strays over their space.
crimsonobama -- Just to remind you Canada Burned down your capital in the War of 1812 and we did not sit out the first half of both WWI and WWII like the USA did. Hope you rmommy lets you watch WrestleMania this weekend so you can chant "USA! USA!" all you want.
